summary: A private header file for the libapparmor library that defines internal macros for resource management, logging, and debugging. It provides error and debug logging facilities through PERROR and PDEBUG macros, as well as a testing utility macro.

logs.reason: Used as an identifier prefix for error messages generated by the libapparmor library
logs.resolution: Informational only, indicates the source of the error message. Check the complete error message for specific issues.

logs.reason: Used as a prefix for debug messages when debug output is enabled
logs.resolution: Informational only, provides debug information for troubleshooting. Only appears when ENABLE_DEBUG_OUTPUT is defined.

logs.reason: Reports a test failure with an error message when a test condition is not met
logs.resolution: Examine the specific error message to understand what test condition failed and fix the underlying issue in the code or configuration being tested.
